The humor in this image comes from the contrast between the formal and informal elements. On the left, you see shiny black dress shoes paired with formal pants, representing a classic, elegant attire. On the right, the unexpected and humorous twist is revealed: dirty white socks and light blue casual sneakers, which clash with the formal look. 

The caption "YES, BUT" highlights this juxtaposition, implying a mixture of styles or intentions. It's funny because it pokes fun at mismatched fashion choices, contrasting the expectation of formal wear with the reality of casual wear underneath.
